mapper.insert: insert into mid_houseinfo ( sysguid, buycertnos, regionname, bldname, cellname, floorname, roomno, buynames, houseAddress ) values ( SYS_GUID(), #{param.buycertnos}, #{param.regionname}, #{param.bldname}, #{param.cellname}, #{param.floorname}, #{param.roomno}, #{param.buynames}, #{param.houseAddress} )
mapper.select: select t.bldname from arc_buildinfo t where t.bldno = '602609053'
